properties.query:
Veeam_GetSecurityEvents
| where instanceId == 23090
| project
    Date = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm'),
    DataSource = original_host,
    EventId = instanceId,
    UserName = user,
    ["Job Name"] = "",
   MessageDetails = Description,
   Severity = SeverityDescription
| project Date, DataSource, EventId, UserName, ["Job Name"],MessageDetails,Severity
properties.description: Detects when a job is deleted from Veeam Backup & Replication. This might indicate unauthorized removal of critical components.
properties.name: Job Deleted
